ApexXSSFromEscapeFalse.description:
Description

Reports on calls toaddErrorwith disabled escaping. The message passed toaddErrorwill be displayed directly to the user in the UI, making it prime ground for XSS
attacks if unescaped.

Example(s):

Use this rule by referencing it:
ApexXSSFromEscapeFalse.option: This rule has no specific options.
